text: Tomara balo -- “amara allah‌te imana enechi, ara ta’te ya amadera jan'ya nayila hayeche, ara ya nayila hayechila ibrahimera kache, ara isama'ila o isahaka, ara iyakuba ebam bibhinna gotrera kache, ara ya deya hayechila musake ebam isake, ara ya sakala nabidera tamdera prabhura kacha theke deya hayechila. Amara tamdera kono ekajanera madhye'o parthakya kari na. Ara amara tamra'i kache musalima hacchi.”
